name: counterwallet-app
description: Desktop crypto wallet UI mock built with Electron + React
author: Counterwallet UI Team

scripts.dev: npm run prepare:icons && concurrently -k "vite" "npm run electron:dev"
scripts.electron:watch: tsup electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist-electron --platform node --external electron --watch
scripts.electron:run: wait-on dist-electron/main.js tcp:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.build: npm run prepare:icons && vite build && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:electron: tsup electron/main.ts electron/preload.ts --format cjs --out-dir dist-electron --platform node --external electron --clean
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis portable
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip --universal
scripts.dist:mac:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip --x64
scripts.dist:mac:arm64: npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip --arm64
